title: Disappointed
review: I originally didn't want to watch this film because the trailer had me scared. But after working up the courage to see it, I was sadly disappointed. Everything up until the end of the movie was great. The first half had me on the edge of my seat and wanting to know more, but the ending just left me disappointed and confused. Definitely not the type of ending I had anticipated. I feel like this film had the potential to be a great movie but the ending ruined it for me.

title: Surprisingly awesome
review: I went into this movie with extremely low expectations. Personally, I am not a gamer so I didn't think the movie would interest me whatsoever. But, I surprisingly really enjoyed the film! It had a great plot and it was enjoyable seeing all the pop culture references. The storyline had me hooked and wanting more.

title: Must see!
review: This film was absolutely amazing. Heartbreaking, but amazing. It definitely tugged some heartstrings. I believe everyone needs to watch this film. Such a great story line. It really makes you appreciate your loved ones and the time you have with them.

title: Great!
review: With all the hype leading up to the film, I definitely had some high expectations of the film. Although it may not be the best Marvel movie, it still was an exceptional film!
